snippet: The Italian design house held its show despite the disappearance of its chief executive whose plane disappeared more than a week ago after takeoff from the Los Roques archipelago, off the coast of Venezuela.
abstract: The Italian design house held its show despite the disappearance of its chief executive whose plane disappeared more than a week ago after takeoff from the Los Roques archipelago, off the coast of Venezuela.

headline.main: Applause at Missoni, but an Empty Stage
headline.print_headline: Applause At Missoni, But an Empty Stage
